pageContent: Researchers evaluated the acceptance and effectiveness of a group intervention that provided education about post-prostatectomy sexual recovery and peer support for couples. Couples valued the intervention and retained the information. Partners became accepting of erectile dysfunction and communicated more openly about upsetting topics.

metaData.source:
Maintenance of sexual activity following androgen deprivation in males
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32712517/
